chatgpt.description:
ChatGPT is an extremely powerful chat bot currently available. It can answer a wide variety of questions in both English and Vietnamese. It can support programming from Front-end to Back-end. Additionally, ChatGPT accounts can answer many different types of questions, including those related to knowledge, culture, society, and other fields.

I. ChatGPT Plus Account Pricing – OpenAI

– GPT-4o technology, preparing to update to the latest GPT-5.
– Genuine account with full Plus features
– Warranty for the entire usage period

1) Shared access plan:

– Shared account access
– Login on 1-2 fixed devices.
– No password changes allowed

2) Private access/upgrade plan: 

– Receive a pre-created account or upgrade your own account, 100% private use.
– Use on multiple devices.
– Password changes allowed.

II. Introduction to ChatGPT Account – OpenAI

ChatGPT is a language model trained using transformer technology and developed by OpenAI. It has the ability to learn from large text datasets and automatically generate answers to questions posed. ChatGPT accounts can be used in chatbot applications, automated conversations, and other advisory systems. It also has the ability to automate tasks such as text translation, form auto-completion, and other language-related tasks.

ChatGPT can answer many different types of questions, including those related to the fields of knowledge, culture, society, and other areas. It can also answer questions that are interrogative in nature and questions that require deeper analysis. However, a ChatGPT account is not a person or an expert system and cannot provide advice or make in-depth decisions in specific fields. It can only answer questions based on the text data it was trained on and cannot provide specialized advice or make in-depth decisions.

III. OpenAI – ChatGPT Account Product Information

This is an account that has been activated with a phone number for use anywhere.

To log in to your account, visit: https://chat.openai.com/chat/

The account also comes with $5 to use for other OpenAI applications through their API.

Example: – AI application for image generation: DALL-E

– Connect OpenAI functions to external applications through API. Details at: https://beta.openai.com/examples

IV. Frequently Asked Questions

1. What is ChatGPT?

ChatGPT is a language model trained using transformer technology and developed by OpenAI. It has the ability to learn from large text datasets and automatically generate answers to questions posed. ChatGPT accounts can be used in chatbot applications, automated conversations, and other advisory systems. It also has the ability to automate tasks such as text translation, form auto-completion, and other language-related tasks.

2. What kinds of questions can ChatGPT answer?

ChatGPT Plus Premium accounts can answer many different types of questions, including those related to knowledge, culture, society, and other fields. It can also answer interrogative questions and questions requiring deeper analysis.

3. Can ChatGPT answer in Vietnamese?

ChatGPT accounts can answer in Vietnamese. If ChatGPT doesn't respond in Vietnamese, you can start a new conversation with the question "Can you speak Vietnamese?" and then chat normally in Vietnamese. However, ChatGPT will provide the best answers in English, so you may want to ask in English and then request "Translate to Vietnamese" to translate the English content into Vietnamese.

4. What should I do if ChatGPT stops before completing its answer?

When the response is too long, ChatGPT may stop midway without providing a complete answer. This issue is common when chatting in Vietnamese. To get the full answer, type "Continue" or "Tiếp tục" to have the AI continue writing the content it was answering. If that doesn't work, click on "Regenerate response" to have the AI recreate the content.

5. How can I make ChatGPT stay focused on a topic I'm asking about?

You should create conversations organized by topic so that ChatGPT can closely follow each topic. This will also save your queries for future reference. This is especially useful when discussing programming in depth, as the AI will understand the issues you're encountering in that topic and provide more accurate suggestions.

6. Is ChatGPT free?

Currently, the AI chat function is completely free. You will only be charged if you use advanced features such as connecting APIs to external applications or custom training the AI to provide specialized responses. The free policy may change depending on OpenAI's direction.

7. I log in to chat but receive the message "We're experiencing exceptionally high demand. Please hang tight as we work on scaling our systems." Then when I chat, the bot responds very slowly. Why is that?

That message means that OpenAI's chat is processing a very high volume of traffic, and their system is unable to handle it, which may result in lag or slowness. If you encounter this message, you may need to be patient and try again later.

grok.description:
Grok AI is a powerful artificial intelligence system developed by xAI that can automatically analyze and process large amounts of of data quickly.

Grok supports natural language conversation in English and can help with research, content creation, data analysis, and many other tasks.
grok.shortDescription: Grok AI is an intelligent system that can process and analyze data quickly, supporting research and content creation.
